Turn a trash can into a garden planter by adding soil and plants to the bottom of the can.
Use a trash can as a birdhouse by drilling holes in the sides and adding a perch.
Make a trash can into a storage unit by using the lid as a shelf for books or other items.
Use a trash can as a mini greenhouse by covering it with plastic and placing it in a sunny location.
Create a trash can sculpture by using it as a canvas for painting or carving.
